<h2>Base modules</h2>
<ol>
<li>padda-core - all entities, service and DAO interfaces, etc.</li>
<li>padda-sites-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-sites-service : implementation of the service </li>
<li>padda-views-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-views-service : implementation of the service </li>
<li>padda-store-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-store-service : implementation of the service </li>
<li>padda-category-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-category-service : implementation of the service </li>
<li>padda-products-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-products-service : implementation of the service</li>
<li>padda-attributes-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-attributes-service : implementation of the service </li>
<li>padda-customer-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-customer-service : implementation of the service</li>
<li>padda-cart-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-cart-service : implementation of the service</li>
<li>padda-wishlist-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-wishlist-service : implementation of the service</li>
<li>padda-comparelist-dao : implementations and persistance</li>
<li>padda-comparelist-service : implementation of the service</li>
<li>padda-web-frontend - base web application for front-end</li>
<li>padda-web-backend - base web application for back-end</li>
</ol>

<h2>Modules for widgets of Front-end</h2>
<ol>
<li>padda-widget-category-horizontal-menu - horizontal menu of categories</li> 
<li>padda-widget-category-vertical-menu - vertical menu of categories for the first page</li> 
<li>padda-widget-current-category - horizontal block with category path, name and other information</li> 
<li>padda-widget-category-shopby - the list of subcategories</li> 
<li>padda-widget-page-header - horizontal block with company logo, links to lists, cart, checkout, search, etc.</li> 
<li>padda-widget-product-list - product list block</li> 
<li>padda-widget-product-list-filter - filtering product list by attributes</li> 
<li>padda-widget-product-details - product details</li>
<li>padda-widget-productlist-compare - compare list</li>
<li>padda-widget-productlist-wishlist - wishlist</li>
<li>padda-widget-productlist-cart - wishlist</li>
</ol>
